answers.answer: Don't stress I have had Gestational diabetes since 24 weeks I  am now 34 weeks.... I went to a dietitian which helped out alot just remember that this is for the health of your baby and you will do fine. And if you do have to take insulin is only for a Short while

I have it now also and my dr tested me early which I am greatful so I adjusted my diet and take insulin.  It's hard at first but once u get past the first couple weeks it becomes routine.  Also I am almost 5 months and I have only gained about 6 lbs total which is great for me and the baby since we are both on track for a healthy pregnancy...so don't stress it won't help just hang in there and u will do great...=)
